name: Macrofate
description:
Trailer

Macrofate is a game about surviving people in outer space. The main is question: "What will happen If 100 last humans need to survive in outer space? Maybe they will die or you will make a new life for remains of human race. You need explore the cosmos, for looking resources, for creating colonies on the planets and develop science. 

Feature List
  • Infinite outer space! - Macrofate generates random outer space. Journey into infinite space of cosmos and explore it! 
  • Realistic time in outer space!
  • Realistic distance - space has a huge size, which many people can't imagine. Feel size of infinite outer space!
  • Spaceship Editor -  Unleash your imagination!
  • Gears - Use the huge set of modifications for your spaceship, which let you customize what you want.
